text: (A messenger) Muhammad (pbuh) (reciting unto you the revelations of Allah) the Qur'an (made plain) making clear the commands and prohibitions, (that He may bring forth those who believe) in Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an (and do good works) and do acts of obedience, secretly between them and their Lord (from darkness unto light) from disbelief to faith. (And whosoever believeth in Allah) and Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an, (and doeth right) sincerely between himself and his Lord, (He will bring him) in the Hereafter (into Gardens beneath which) beneath its trees and habitations (rivers flow) river of wine, water, honey and milk flow, (therein to abide for ever) they will dwell in the Garden, never to die or leave. (Allah hath made good provision for him) Allah has prepared a reward for him in Paradise.
